title: (x) Geometric sans on Lexus website - Nobel {Tim D}
content:
Can you please help me ID this Lexus font? Thanks.

Josh

_Edit: courtesy of this post  
http://typophile.com/node/14158_

If you would’ve done a Search on Typophile with “Lexus” you would’ve found [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204103438/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20lexus). It works if you know what you’re looking for.
